T02D2880a:219b-0: @219b * // phyag na rdo rje'i spur bsad las tshogs bsdus pa bzhugs /
T02D2880a:219b-1: bcom ldan 'das dpal phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2880a:219b-2: bsnyen sgrub rtags dang ldan gyur nas //
T02D2880a:219b-3: sdur zhing bsad pa'i las dag brtsam //
T02D2880a:219b-4: de yang las tshogs bsdus pa las //
T02D2880a:219b-5: zhi bar ma gyur gdon bgegs la //
T02D2880a:219b-6: smyag shad bal po se 'u yi //
T02D2880a:219b-7: sngags bzlas lcug mas bya bas sam brabs //
T02D2880a:219b-8: 'jigs pa brgyad kyi rdzas kyis gzir //
T02D2880a:219b-9: zhes pa ni spur bsad kyi sbyor ba'o //
T02D2880a:219b-10: de'ang spur pa ni bskrad pa'i las te /
T02D2880a:219b-11: thog mar rig pa 'dzin pa nyid kyis zhugs pa bzhi'i mtshan nyid brtags la /
T02D2880a:219b-12: nad rnams dbyung zhing gnod pa gdon par bya ba'i thabs ni /
T02D2880a:219b-13: rgyal po bram ze rje rigs kyi//
T02D2880a:220a-0: @220a * // gzhon nu gtsang ma shar bltas te //
T02D2880a:220a-1: dkon mchog gsum dang gos sngon la //
T02D2880a:220a-2: phyag 'tshal sems bskyed smyag shad blang //
T02D2880a:220a-3: dag byed sngags bzlas chus bsangs la //
T02D2880a:220a-4: yungs kar rma bya tshon skud bcings //
T02D2880a:220a-5: bya ba pa'i rdzas de rtag tu bcang //
T02D2880a:220a-6: de nas rin chen snod dag tu ;
T02D2880a:220a-7: / gtso bo klu chen brgyad po dang //
T02D2880a:220a-8: rigs drug rigs bzhi'i sa bdag gnyen //
T02D2880a:220a-9: gzugs brnyan byas te klu sman dang //
T02D2880a:220a-10: dkar gsum rin chen dar zab bcas //
T02D2880a:220a-11: shing snas mtha' bskor tshon lngas brgyan //
T02D2880a:220a-12: gzhan yang mchod rdzas thams cad bsogs //
T02D2880a:220a-13: rig pa 'dzin pas sgrub thabs ltar //
T02D2880a:220a-14: sngon du 'gro ba'i las rdzogs bya //
T02D2880a:220a-15: gtso bo gdan gyi klu brgyad las //
T02D2880a:220a-16: pam las 'dab brgyad nam gyis mtshan //
T02D2880a:220a-17: de gyur sbrul lam klu chen brgyad //
T02D2880a:220a-18: btsun mo sras bcas blon po dang //
T02D2880a:220a-19: sprul pa yang sprul rnams bskyed la //
T02D2880a:220a-20: de dang 'dra ba bkug bstim mchod //
T02D2880a:220a-21: dbang bskur gtor ma byin rlabs sbyin //
T02D2880a:220a-22: aom n'a ga r'a dzab su ta ksha ka karko
T02D2880a:220a-23: ta padma ma h'a padma sham kha p'a la ghe
T02D2880a:220a-24: la ghe 'u hu lu hu lu ta ge ni
T02D2880a:220a-26: gri hna gri hna kh'a hi kh'a hi /
T02D2880a:220a-27: gtor ma byin pas gdug rtsub zhi //
T02D2880a:220a-28: de nas bdag nyid khro bor bsgom //
T02D2880a:220a-29: gzungs sngags bzlas shing lcug mas bya ba //
T02D2880a:220a-30: n'a ga r'a dza bsu ki hri da ya dha ra ya phud phud /
T02D2880a:220a-40: hri da ya dha ra ya phud phud /
T02D2880a:220a-41: nad pa la bya ba gzugs la dbab //
T02D2880a:220a-42: dug phyung khro bo'i che brjod la //
T02D2880a:220a-43: zla dkyil steng bzhag yam las bskyod //
T02D2880a:220a-44: n'a ga spha ra na phat ces //
T02D2880a:220a-45: klu bro bsgags cing dam tshig bsgrags //
T02D2880a:220a-46: gzungs brgya bzlas la phur zhing bskrad //
T02D2880a:220a-47: de ltar brgya'am stong byas na //
T02D2880a:220a-48: klu yin da las grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2880a:220a-49: gzugs brnyan sa'am chu bor dor //
T02D2880a:220a-51: zhi dang spur bas mi thul zhing //
T02D2880a:220a-53: de la 'jigs pa'i las brgyad brtsam //
T02D2880a:220a-54: grog mkhar bdud 'chang tshub ma yi //
T02D2880a:220a-55: sa las mthing nag gru gsum brtsig / zur gsum lcags kyu brtsegs mas mtshan //
T02D2880a:220b-0: dbus su ling ga sngon dmar @220b gyis //
T02D2880a:220b-1: bcings te byad bcug phur la btod //
T02D2880a:220b-2: mgyogs phur rtsang dang phur pas bskor //
T02D2880a:220b-3: bye tshan gze ma yungs kar dang //
T02D2880a:220b-4: tshal zangs lcags dur blugs bcas //
T02D2880a:220b-5: dmar gtor dug gtor dug thun bsham //
T02D2880a:220b-6: gru gsum dur khrod g-yam pas bcad //
T02D2880a:220b-7: dur khrod ras la nam mkha' lding//
T02D2880a:220b-8: gser mdog zhal gsum phyag drug gis //
T02D2880a:220b-9: ba su ta yi klu rnams 'dzin //
T02D2880a:220b-10: spyan mig nyi zer rdo rje'i mchu //
T02D2880a:220b-11: 'khor lo'i gzhug sgro ral gri'i gshog / lus rnams rdo rje'i spu yis gtams //
T02D2880a:220b-12: de 'dra rgyal rigs kha bstan gzhag / khra spyad nya khra gcan gzan gyi //
T02D2880a:220b-13: mche sder la sogs khyu rnams bsog / drag po'i mchod yon bsham byas la //
T02D2880a:220b-14: de nas rig pa 'dzin pa rnams //
T02D2880a:220b-15: na ra'i gos gyon gos sngon gyi //
T02D2880a:220b-16: so so'i bsam gtan la zhugs nas //
T02D2880a:220b-17: bsnyen sgrub spur dang gsang sngags bzlas //
T02D2880a:220b-18: zhi bas dug phyung gsad pa yi //
T02D2880a:220b-19: rtse gcig bsgoms te brtson 'grus kyis //
T02D2880a:220b-20: bar chad med par las la sbyar //
T02D2880a:220b-21: nag po'i tshes brgyad nas brtsams te //
T02D2880a:220b-22: zhi ba byams pa snying rje bsgom //
T02D2880a:220b-23: gzungs kyi sngags dang sh'antim bzlas //
T02D2880a:220b-24: nad dang gdug rtsub zhi bar bsam //
T02D2880a:220b-25: spur ba gong du bstan pa bzhin //
T02D2880a:220b-26: gsad ba'i sbyor ba'i drag sngags ni //
T02D2880a:220b-27: rig pa 'dzin pa h'um yig las //
T02D2880a:220b-28: gyur te nag po char sprin mdog / smin mtshams dpral bsdus ha ha bzhad //
T02D2880a:220b-29: rdo rje tshar gcod sdigs mdzub bcas //
T02D2880a:220b-30: de 'drar bsgoms te yungs kar la //
T02D2880a:220b-31: sngags bzlas tshangs pa'i gnas su brab //
T02D2880a:220b-32: shi sa drag po 'di yis gdab //
T02D2880a:220b-33: yaksha n'i l'amba ra dha ra badzra p'a ni h'um /
T02D2880a:220b-34: ma h'a yaksha se n'a ba ta ye de ba ku ru sha na dha ra //
T02D2880a:220b-35: thog thog thog ril thog thog dar byams sad //
T02D2880a:220b-36: che ge mo'i lus la rum rum //
T02D2880a:220b-37: snying la shag shag ma ma sh'anti rbad pu nanti ta sri rbad bu nan /
T02D2880a:220b-38: n'a gas khrag pu ma m'a ra ya phat //
T02D2880a:220b-39: yungs kar yungs nag ske tshe dang //
T02D2880a:220b-40: tsha la zangs lcags bye tshan char //
T02D2880a:220b-41: gnam lcags drag po'i sngags des brdeg / gcan gzan mche sder bya khra'i mchu //
T02D2880a:220b-42: mkha' lding rgyal po'i sngags bzlas brab //
T02D2880a:220b-43: k'i la ya dang bcas pa'i sngags //
T02D2880a:220b-44: dus drug phur pas gzir bar bya //
T02D2880a:221a-0: 'og nas drag po'i rdzas kyis bdug / skyag shang bal @221a * //
T02D2880a:221a-2: lcug mas brdeg cing rig sngags bzlas //
T02D2880a:221a-3: g-yas nas gsad cing g-yon nas spur //
T02D2880a:221a-4: mi bzad rdzas kyis de la byug / gag pa lhog pa byung ba bzhin //
T02D2880a:221a-5: drag po'i sngags kyis de la gdab //
T02D2880a:221a-6: bdun nam rtsa gcig bdun tsho bdun //
T02D2880a:221a-7: de la sogs te bsgrubs gyur na ;
T02D2880a:221a-8: / n'a ga r'a dza karko ta //
T02D2880a:221a-9: des zin pa yang grol 'gyur nges //
T02D2880a:221a-10: phyag na rdo rje'i las bsdus 'di //
T02D2880a:221a-11: pandi ta rnams kyis mdzad pas //
T02D2880a:221a-12: mi ma yin rnams skrag cing brgyal //
T02D2880a:221a-13: des na rnam smin sdig pa'i rgyu //
T02D2880a:221a-14: de phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs //
T02D2880a:221a-15: dpal phyag na rdo rje'i spur gsad las tshogs bsdus pa zhes bya ba /
